item.title: Server Became so Trash.
item.author: invalid@example.com (SUNC123)

item.content:encoded: Server is currently very trash i got banned 30 days i dont even know the reason the admin just put random letters and smth about behavior.If its about my behavior i think that's for mute not for ban.In last few days i got kicked 20 times from server for ''cheat is not allowed'' cuz i was clicking only 12 cps lmao.Also players are scamming and a lot of players dont get punished for foreign langauge and very bad behavior but ofc i do.Trash Staff.Trash Server I hope yall fix this in future.

item.content:encoded:
Hi, the faction Palestine, in OPFactions. uses raid bots to detect incoming tnt. we started shooting and 20 seconds later 5 people came right away. This is extremely suspicious and i would love for it to be checked.
